test.name: TSQL003A
test.pre-run-sql-statement: CREATE TABLE TAB1 (FLD1 INT)
CREATE TABLE TAB2 (FLD2 INT)

tests.test:
CONNECT TO :DATASRC USER :DBUSR/:DBPWD #000
all all
tab1 tab2 tab1 tab2
Environment.SetEnvironmentVariable("DATASRC1", build_data_source_string(false, true, true, 0)); Environment.SetEnvironmentVariable("DBID1", "CONN1"); Environment.SetEnvironmentVariable("DATASRC_USR1", get_datasource_usr(0)); Environment.SetEnvironmentVariable("DATASRC_PWD1", get_datasource_pwd(0)); Environment.SetEnvironmentVariable("DATASRC2", build_data_source_string(false, true, true, 1)); Environment.SetEnvironmentVariable("DATASRC_USR2", get_datasource_usr(1) + "." + get_datasource_pwd(1));
CONNECT SQLCODE(1): +0000000000 CONNECT SQLCODE(2): +0000000000 T1 : 0009 T2 : 0900 TOTAL: 0909 SQLSTATE FAIL1: OK SQLSTATE FAIL2: OK CRSR01 rec #0001 : [0001] CRSR01 rec #0002 : [0003] CRSR01 rec #0003 : [0005] CRSR02 rec #0001 : [0100] CRSR02 rec #0002 : [0300] CRSR02 rec #0003 : [0500] TOT CRSR01 :0009 TOT CRSR02 :0900

expected-output.line: All records in this table have been selected

test.name: TSQL005A
test.pre-run-sql-statement: create table bintest (bfld bytea, vbfld bytea, cfld char(100), vcfld varchar(100), num1 numeric(4,2))
create table bintest (bfld RAW(100), vbfld LONG RAW, cfld char(100), vcfld varchar(100), num1 number(4,2))
create table bintest (bfld binary(200), vbfld varbinary(200), cfld char(100), vcfld varchar(100), num1 numeric(4,2))
create table bintest (bfld binary(200), vbfld varbinary(200), cfld char(100), vcfld varchar(100), num1 numeric(4,2))

pre-run-sql-statement.comment: For ODBC, we assume PostgreSQL to be the underlying DBMS

test.pre-run-sql-statement: create table bintest (bfld bytea, vbfld bytea, cfld char(100), vcfld varchar(100), num1 numeric(4,2))
insert into bintest (bfld, vbfld, cfld, vcfld, num1) values (:p1, :p2, 'ABCDEFGHIJK', 'ABCDEFGHIJK', 12.34)
insert into bintest (bfld, vbfld, cfld, vcfld, num1) values (:p1, :p2, 'ABCDEFGHIJK', 'ABCDEFGHIJK', 12.34)
insert into bintest (bfld, vbfld, cfld, vcfld, num1) values (:p1, :p2, 'ABCDEFGHIJK', 'ABCDEFGHIJK', 12.34)
insert into bintest (bfld, vbfld, cfld, vcfld, num1) values (?, ?, 'ABCDEFGHIJK', 'ABCDEFGHIJK', 12.34)
insert into bintest (bfld, vbfld, cfld, vcfld, num1) values (?, ?, 'ABCDEFGHIJK', 'ABCDEFGHIJK', 12.34)
